content: hello this is my new pattern for shawl called trilobite there are 2 versions of shawl in this pattern classical triangle symmetric shawl - pattern contains both chart and written pattern - asymmetric shawl pattern chart i hope you will like it please do not hesitate to contact me in the case of problems if you like my patterns feel free to join my fb group https //www facebook com/groups/2760769384151530/ you can find there all info about my patterns also news and some gifts
